NewDataSet:
<#list orders as order>
	<#assign titleMap = order.orderTitleMap/>
	
		${titleMap['id']}
		
		<#if titleMap['订单号：']??>
		${titleMap['订单号：']}
		<#else>
		
		</#if>
		<#if titleMap['订单日期：']??>
		${titleMap['订单日期：']}
		<#else>
		
		</#if>
		<#if titleMap['预计收货日期：']??>
		${titleMap['预计收货日期：']}
		<#else>
		
		</#if>
		
	
	<#if order.ordersItemList??>
	<#assign productList = order.ordersItemList/>
	<#list productList as product>
	
		${product['id']}
		${product['商品号']}
		
		${product['商品名称']}
		${product['订单数量']}
		
		
		
		
		${product['单价']}
		${product['金额']}
		${product['税率']}
	
	</#list>
	</#if>
	</#list>
